tool.name: Homozygous Variant Filter
tool.description: Filters out homozygous variants which are present in more than a certain number of samples

param.name: count
param.label: Least number of samples to be found in

tool.help:
Filters out all homozygous variants which can be found in more than a given number of samples.
Credits
SnpSift is used to filter the data. Cingolani, P. "snpEff: Variant effect prediction", http://snpeff.sourceforge.net, 2012.
